title: Bloomberg Law Brief: Mueller Expands Investigation (Audio)
itunes:title: Bloomberg Law Brief: Mueller Expands Investigation (Audio)
description:
Peter Zeidenberg, a Partner at Arent Fox LLP, discusses how special counsel Robert Mueller is expanding his investigation into connections between President Trump and Russia. He speaks with June Grasso and Michael Best on Bloomberg Radio's "Bloomberg Law."

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
